ChildObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ChildObjects.Description: Invaders placed on this will be Destroyed (with the Fear automatically Generated).
ChildObjects.LuaScript:
function tryObjectEnter(enter_object)
    Global.call("cleanupObject", {obj=enter_object, fear=true, reason="Destroying"})
    return false
end
ChildObjects.XmlUI:
<Defaults>
    <Text color="#000000" fontSize="64" fontStyle="Bold" verticalOverflow="Overflow"/>
    <Button fontSize="50"/>
    <Toggle toggleWidth="50" toggleHeight="50" textColor="#FFFFFF" fontSize="50" verticalOverflow="Overflow"/>
</Defaults>

<Panel id="drownPanel" visibility="Invisible" width="180" height="50" position="0 0 -12" rotation="0 0 180">
    <HorizontalLayout childForceExpandWidth="false" childForceExpandHeight="false" childAlignment="MiddleCenter">
        <Text id="count"/>
        <Text text=" / "/>
        <Text id="players"/>
    </HorizontalLayout>
</Panel>
<Panel id="drownPanel2" visibility="Invisible" width="330" height="150" position="0 180 -12" rotation="0 0 180">
    <VerticalLayout>
        <Button onClick="exchange" textAlignment="MiddleCenter" minHeight="60">+1 Energy</Button>
        <Toggle id="toggleExchange" onValueChanged="toggleExchange" isOn="true">Auto Energy</Toggle>
    </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>
